column1: Table 51.  Oklahoma - Race and Hispanic Origin:  1890 to 1990
(See text for sources, definitions, and explanations)  Table with row headers in column A and column headers in rows 3 to 5
- Rounds to 0.0.  (X) Not applicable.  (NA) Not available.  1/Hispanic origin based on Spanish language. 2/Hispanic origin based on the White population of
Spanish mother tongue.  Percentages shown based on sample data prorated to the 100-percent count of the White population and on the 100-percent
count of the total population. These estimates are in italics.  See Table E-6 and text.  3/Includes Indian Territory and Indian reservations.
